title: 那么这场游戏秀的（通关）目标是什么？
author: 你妹的M_US
txt_content:
至于Minecraft 1.6.2版本下载SPC 4.9如何安装Minecraft 1.6.21. Close Minecraft launcher (if open)1。关闭Minecraft发射器（如果打开）2. Navigate to where Minecraft is installed (eg: on Windows %appdata%/.minecraft)2。导航到安装在Minecraft（例如：在Windows %APPDATA% / Minecraft。）3. Go to versions and copy the 1.6.2 directory and name it something else (eg: 1.6.2.mods). Alternatively, if you have done this for another mod already backup the Minecraft JAR.3。去复制1.6.2版本目录和名称的东西（如：1.6.2。MODS）。另外，如果你这样做了另一个MOD已经备份Minecraft罐。4. Open the jar file (using an archive utility, such as 7zip) in the mod directory you created (eg: 1.6.2.jar) and copy all of the files into it except for WorldEdit.jar4。打开jar文件（使用档案事业，如7zip）在MOD目录创建（例如：1.6.2。罐）和复制所有文件到它除了worldedit.jar5. Delete the files in the META-INF directory except for MANIFEST.MF5。删除文件在META-INF目录除了manifest.mf6. Close the jar file6。关闭的JAR文件7. Copy WorldEdit.jar into .minecraft/bin7。复制worldedit.jar进入Minecraft /箱8. Rename the jar file to the same name as the directory (eg: 1.6.2.mods.jar)8。将JAR文件名相同的目录（例如：1.6.2。MODS。罐）9. Rename the json file to the same name as the directory (eg: 1.6.2.mods.json)9。将JSON文件名相同的目录（例如：1.6.2。MODS。JSON）10. Open the json file in a text editor and the line that contains the id (eg: "id": "1.6.2") change it to the same name as the directory (eg: "id": "1.6.2.mods")10。在文本编辑器和包含ID线开放的JSON文件（如：“身份证”：“1.6.2”）改变它的同名目录（例如：“身份证”：“1.6.2 MODS。”）11. Save and close the json file.11。保存并关闭JSON文件。12. Start up the Minecraft launcher12。启动Minecraft发射器13. Create a new profile13。创建新的配置文件14. Select the version that you just created (eg: 1.6.2.mods)14。选择版本，您刚刚创建的（如：1.6.2。MODS）15. Select the rest of your settings.15。请选择其他设置。16. Launch the game.16。启动游戏。 注意：使用第三方的发射器如魔法发射器可以节省你很多时间管理插件。Code is open source at: https://github.com/simo415/spc源代码是开放的：https://github.com/simo415/spcFor more information on commands, use "/help <commandname>" in-game or visit:在命令的更多信息，使用“/帮助< CommandName >”游戏或访问：http://youtube.com/user/spcmod 命令列表To bring up the command "console" type 'T' then type in the command. Below is a brief run through of the command list:把命令“控制台”式的“T”然后输入命令。下面是一个简短的贯穿的命令列表：Normal Commands (Version 1.3 to Current Version):正常的命令（1.3版本版本）：? - help [COMMAND_NAME] - Activates the help message.？-帮助[ command_name ] -激活的帮助信息。ascend - Moves you to the next platform above your current position.提升-移动你超过你当前位置的下一个平台。bind <KEYCODE> <COMMAND> {PARAMETERS} - Binds a command to a keyboard button.<密码> <命令>绑定参数} { -绑定命令键盘按钮。bindid <KEYID> <COMMAND> {PARAMETERS} - Binds a command to a keyboard key using the key id.bindid＜keyid > <命令> { } -参数绑定一个命令的键盘按键使用的密钥IDcannon [STRENGTH] - Shoots a primed TNT in the direction you are pointing at the chosen strength.炮[强度]射底漆TNT的方向，你是指在选择强度。damage [enable|disable] - Turns player damage on/off.损伤[使|禁用] -打开/关闭玩家造成的伤害。debug -调试—defaultgamemode—descend - Moves you to the next platform below your current position.下降-移动你的当前位置下面的下一个平台。diff - difficulty [DIFFICULTY] - Sets the difficulty to the specified level (valid values 0-3).不同难度的[困难] -设置困难到指定的水平（有效值0-3）。difficulty [DIFFICULTY] - Sets the difficulty to the specified level (valid values 0-3).问题[困难] -设置困难到指定的水平（有效值0-3）。effect <list|remove TYPE|add TYPE [DURATION] [STRENGTH]> - Configures potion effects on the player<列表|效果移除类型|添加类型[时间] [强度] > -配置药剂对球员enchant <list|remove|add TYPE [LEVEL]> - Enchants the currently selected item.附魔<列表|删除|添加类型[水平] >附魔当前选定的项目。fly [ENABLE|DISABLE] - Allows you to turn flying mode on/off飞[使|禁用] -允许你打开/关闭飞行模式gamemode <creative|survival|adventure>- Changes the game mode.游戏模式<创意|生存|冒险>改变游戏模式。gamerule -<rule name><value> OR <rule name>.gamerule <0规则名称> <值>或<规则名称>。give <ITEMCODE|ITEMNAME> [QUANTITY] [DAMAGE]– Gives player item, if quantity isn’t specified maximum amount of that item. See i & item.给＜itemcode |项目名称> [数量] [破坏]–给球员的项目，如果数量不该项目指定的最大数量。看到我的项目。gm - gamemode [creative|survival|adventure]- Changes the game mode.通用游戏模式[创意|生存|冒险]改变游戏模式。hardcore [enable|disable]– Configures the world for hardcore mode or not.硬[禁用]使|–配置世界的核心模式或不。heal <QUANTITY>- Heals a player the specified number of points (2 per heart).<量> -治疗治疗运动员指定数量的点（2每心）。health <min|max|infinite|get>- Sets the health of a player to pre-defined figures.健康<分钟|最大|无限|得到> -设置预定义的数字健康的球员。help [COMMAND_NAME]– Activates the help menu. If no COMMAND_NAME given, lists help commands.帮助command_name ] [–激活帮助菜单。如果没有command_name给予帮助的命令，列出。home– Teleport to spawn point.家–传送到产卵点。hunger <empty|full|infinite>-Setsyour hunger level to predefined points.饥饿<空|全|无限> - setsyour饥饿程度的预定义的点。i - give <ITEMCODE|ITEMNAME> [QUANTITY] [DAMAGE]– Gives player item, if quantity isn’t specified maximum amount of that item. See give & item.我给＜itemcode |项目名称> [数量] [破坏]–给球员的项目，如果数量不该项目指定的最大数量。看到给项目。ignite- sets the upper surface of the block you're pointing at on fire.点燃套你指着火块上表面。Info– Block information tool.信息–块信息的工具。item <ITEMCODE|ITEMNAME> [QUANTITY] [DAMAGE]– Gives player item, if quantity isn’t specified maximum amount of that item. See give & i.项目项目名称> < itemcode | [数量] [破坏]–给球员的项目，如果数量不该项目指定的最大数量。给我看jump- Moves you from where you are to where your mouse is pointing.跳的动作你你是从那里来，你的鼠标指向。杀–杀死玩家当前。killall <ENTITY_TYPE [DISTANCE]>- Kills all the specified entity type, this destroys ALL entities (paintings, minecarts, etc) if no distance. As of 06 Dec 2012 this causes the game to freeze.< entity_type killall [距离] >杀死了所有指定的实体类型，这破坏了所有的实体（绘画，minecarts，等等）如果没有距离。截至06月2012这使游戏冻结。light- Turns permanent lighting on and off.光将永久性照明和关闭。macro <FILE>[PARAMETERS]– Allows multiple Commands to be run.宏<文件> [参数]–允许多个要运行的命令。me <action>-我<动作>—msg </tell>-味精< /告诉>—path[BLOCK][RADIUS]– Creates a path as you walk.路径[块] [半径]–创建一个路径作为你走。platform– Creates a glass square under your feet.平台–创建一个玻璃广场在你的脚下。pos– Gives current player position.POS–给予玩家当前位置。publish-发布—repair [all]- Repairs the currently selected item to full health. /repair all - repairs all inventory items except worn armor, if removed and added to inventory, it too is repaired.修理【一切】-维修当前选定的项目的全面健康。/维修-维修所有库存物品除了穿盔甲，如果被添加到库存，它也是修复。say <message>-说<信息>—种子–显示世界种子。setspawn [X Y Z]– Set the current position as the spawn point, if X Y Z are specified sets that position as spawn pointsetspawn [ x y z ]–设置当前位置作为产卵点，如果x y z是指定的卵点集，位置setspeed [SPEED|reset]- Sets the speed that the player movessetspeed [的速度|复位] -设置，玩家移动速度spawn <NAME|ID|random|list> [QUANTITY]- Allows you to spawn creatures.产卵的<名称| ID |随机|列表> [数量] -允许您生成的生物。spawnpoint- /spawnpoint <player> OR /spawnpoint <player> <X> <Y> <Z>.spawnpoint / spawnpoint <玩家>或<玩家> < spawnpoint x > < y > <Z>。spc– Provides generic commands around SPC.SPC–提供通用的命令在巴格达su– Allows commands to be run as a specified player. /su simo_415 give 35:14 5 (give 5ea red wool).苏–允许指定要运行的命令作为一个球员。/苏simo_415给35:14 5（给5ea红毛）。t <X> <Y> <Z>- Teleport to X Y Z coordinates. See /tele & /teleport.T＜x > < y > <Z> -传送到x y z坐标。看到/电话/传送。tele <X> <Y> <Z>- Teleport to X Y Z coordinates. See /t & teleport.远程＜x > < y > <Z> -传送到x y z坐标。看到/ T和传送。teleport <X> <Y> <Z>- Teleport to X Y Z coordinates. See /t & /tele.传送＜x > < y > <Z> -传送到x y z坐标。看到/ T和/遥。tell <player> <private message> -告诉<玩家> <私人讯息>—time [set[TIME<minute|hour|day>]|day|night] – Get or set minecraft time.时间[设置[时间＜分钟|小时|天> ] |天|晚上]–获取或设置Minecraft时间。toggledownfall-toggledownfall—unbind <KEYCODE|all> - Unbinds the specified key from a command.<密码> |解除所有-解除绑定指定键从一个命令。unbindid <ID>- Unbinds a command from a keyboard key using the key id.unbindid <标识> -解除绑定的命令从使用的密钥ID。键盘按键w-W—weather <lightning|thunder|rain[enable|disable]> - Toggles weather effects on/off.天气<闪电|雷|雨[使|禁用] > -切换天气影响的开/关。xp <amount>[player] OR /xp <L amount>[player] - where L = level– Changes player experience or experience level.XP <量> [球员]或/ XP＜L量> [球员]，L =水平–球员的经验或经验水平的变化。Read a review of Single Player Commands.读单人命令回顾。WorldEdit Commandsworldedit命令列出一worldedit命令，请访问worldedit wiki页面：HTTP：/ /维基。sk89q有限公司违约金/参考Global Command全局命令//limit <limit>- Set a maximum number of blocks to change at most for all operations. This only affects yourself. Use this to prevent catastrophic accidents. This command will not override the limit in theconfigurationif it is set./ /限制<limit>设定的最大数量的块的变化在所有操作。这只影响自己。用这个来防止灾难性事故。这个命令将不会超越极限theconfigurationif是集。Brushes刷//brush clipboard -Switch to the clipboard tool./ /刷剪贴板-切换到剪贴板工具。//brush cylinder [-h] <type> <radius> [height] -Switch to the cylinder brush tool./ /刷缸[ H ] <类型> <半径> [高度] -切换到缸刷工具。//brush smooth <radius> [iterations] -Smooth the region./ /刷平＜半径> [ ]光滑迭代区域。//brush sphere [-h] <type> <radius> -Switch to the sphere brush tool./ /刷球[ H ] <类型> <半径> -切换到球刷工具。//mask -Clear the mask/ /面膜清除面膜//mask <mask> -Set a mask/ /面膜<面具>设定的面具//mat <mat> -Change the material used by your current brush./ /垫垫> < -改变你目前的刷用的材料。//size <size> -Change the size of the current brushes/ /尺寸＜量＞-改变当前画笔的大小Chunk tools大块的工具//chunkinfo- Get the filename of the chunk that you are in./ / chunkinfo -块的文件名，你是。//delchunks -Generate a shell script to delete chunks./ / delchunks生成一个shell脚本来删除块。//listchunks -Print a list of used chunks./ / listchunks -打印清单的使用语块。Clipboard剪贴板//clearclipboard -Clear your clipboard./ / clearclipboard清除剪贴板。//copy -Copies the currently selected region. Be aware that it stores your position relative to the selection when copying./ /复制-复制当前选定的区域。注意，它存储你的位置相对于选择当复制。//cut -Cuts the currently selected region./ /剪切当前选定的区域。//flip [dir] -Flip the clipboard./ /翻转[目录]翻转剪贴板。//load <filename> -Load .schematic into clipboard./ /负载<文件>荷载示意图到剪贴板。//paste [-ao] -Pastes the clipboard./ /粘贴[澳] -粘贴剪贴板。//rotate <angle-in-degrees> -Rotate the clipboard./ /旋转角度旋转> - <剪贴板。//save <filename> -Save clipboard to .schematic.保存文件名> / <保存剪贴板。示意图。一般命令//search <item> -Search for an item by its name./ /搜索<item> -按名称搜索项目。//worldedit reload -Reloads WorldEdit's configuration./ / worldedit加载-加载worldedit的配置。//worldedit tz -Set your timezone. This is temporary./ / worldedit TZ -设置您的时区。这是暂时的。//worldedit version -Gets WorldEdit's version./ / worldedit版-获得worldedit版。Generation代//cyl <block> <radius> [height] -Create a vertical cylinder./ /共青团<块> <半径> [高度] -创建一个垂直的圆筒。//forestgen [size] [type] [density] -Make a forest./ / forestgen [大小] [型]【密度】-成林。//hcyl <block> <radius> [height] -Create a vertical hollow cylinder./ / hcyl <块> <半径> [高度] -创建一个垂直的圆筒。//hsphere <block> <radius> [raised?] -Create a hollow sphere./ / hsphere <块> <半径> [长大的吗？] -创造一个空心球。//pumpkins [size] -Make a pumpkin forest/ /南瓜[大小] -做一个南瓜森林//sphere <block> <radius> [raised?] -Create a sphere./ /球<块> <半径> [长大的吗？] -创建一个球体。Getting around绕过//ascend -Go up one level./ /升-上一个层次。//ceil [clearance] -Get to the ceiling./ /细胞[清除] -到天花板。//descend –Go down one level./ /下降–下去一个水平。//jumpto- Jump to the block that you are looking at./ /跳转跳到块，你看。//thru -Go through the wall that you are looking at./ /通穿过墙壁，你看。//unstuck -Go up to the first free spot./ /失败-走到第一个自由的点。//up [distance]- Go up some distance./ / [距离]去了一些距离。历史//clearhistory -Clear your history./ / clearhistory -清除历史记录。//redo [number of steps] -Redo your last (undo) action. This command replays back history and does not repeat the command./ /重做[步骤]数重做你的最后（撤消）行动。这个命令重播回历史不会重复命令。//undo [number of steps (default – last)]- Undo your last action./ /撤消[步数（默认–最后）]的撤销上次操作。Region operations地区运营//move [count] [direction] [leave-id] -Move the selection's contents. A block can be specified to fill in the left over area./ /移动[数] [方向] [让] -移动选择的内容。一块可被指定来填补剩下的地区。//overlay <block> -Place a block on top of blocks inside the region./ /覆盖<块>的地方一块顶部区域内的块。//outline <block> -Build walls, floor, and ceiling./ /大纲> <块建造墙壁，地板，天花板。//regen -Regenerate the selection region./ /再生-再生区域的选择。//replace <to-block> -Replace all non-air blocks blocks inside the region./ /替换<块>替换所有非空的块的块内的地区。//replace <from-block> <to-block> -Replace all blocks of the specified block(s) with another block inside the region./ /替换<从块> <块>更换所有的块的特定的块（S）与另一块区域内。//set <block> -Set all blocks inside the selection region to a specified block.／／设置<块>设定的所有块内选择区域的指定块。//smooth [iterations] -Smooth the selection's heightmap.[重复] /光滑光滑的选择的高度图。//stack [count] [direction]- Stacks the selection.【数】/栈栈选择[方向]。//walls <block>- Build the walls of the region (not including ceiling and floor)./ /墙<块> -建立该地区的墙（不包括天花板和地板）。Scripting脚本//cs <script> [args...] -Executes a script./ / CS <脚本> [ args……] -执行脚本。//.s [args...] -Re-executes last script with new arguments./ /。[参数]的……-重新执行最后的脚本的新参数。//<script>.js [args...] -Executes a JS script./ / < > JS脚本。[ args……] -执行一个JS脚本。Selection选择//chunk -Select the chunk that you are within for your selection./ /块选择块，你在为你的选择。//contract <amount>- Contracts the selection in the direction that you are looking towards./ /合同<量>合同选择的方向，你看。//contract <amount> [direction] -Contracts the selection in the specified direction (north, east, south, west)./ /合同<量> [方向]合同选择在指定的方向（北，南，东，西）。//contract <amount> <reverse-amount> [direction]- Contracts the selection in two directions at once./ /合同金额> < <反转量> [方向]合同的选择在两个方向同时。//count <block> -Count the number of blocks in the region./ /计数＜块>计算区域内的块的数量。//distr [-c] -Get the block distribution in the selection./ /分销[ C ]在选择块分配。//expand <amount>- Expands the selection in the direction that you are looking./ /扩大<量> -扩展选择的方向，你看到的是。//expand <amount> [direction]- Expands the selection in the specified direction (north, east, south, west, up, down)./ /扩大<量> [方向] -扩展选择在指定的方向（北，东，南，西，上，下）。//expand <amount> <reverse-amount> [direction]- Expands the selection in two directions at once./ /扩大<量> <反转量> [方向] -扩展选择在两个方向同时。//expand <vert>- Expands the selection to include sky to bedrock./ /扩大＜草木> -扩展选择包括基岩的天空。//hpos1- Set selection position #1 to the block that you are looking at./ / hpos1 -设置选择的位置# 1块，你看。//hpos2- Set selection position #2 to the block that you are looking at./ / hpos2 -设置选择的位置# 2块，你看。it is set.它是集。//inset [-hv] <amount> -Inset the selection in every direction./ /插图[ ] <量>高压-插图的选择在每一个方向。//outset [-hv] <amount> -Outset the selection in every direction.//开始[ ] <量> -高压一开始就选择在每一个方向。//pos1- Set selection position #1 to the block above the one that you are standing on./ / pos1 -设置选择的位置# 1以上，你是站在一块。//pos2- Set selection position #2 to the block above the one that you are standing on./ / pos2 -设置选择的位置# 2以上，你是站在一块。//sel <cuboid or poly>- Choose the region shape to use for selections./ / SEL <长方体或聚> -选择区域的形状使用选择。//shift <amount> [direction] -Moves the selection region. It does not move the selection's contents./ /移<量> [方向] -移动区域的选择。它没有移动选择的内容。//size -Get the size of selected region./ /尺寸到选定区域的大小。//toggleeditwand- Toggles the edit wand selection mode, allowing you to use the edit wand item normally./ / toggleeditwand -切换编辑魔杖选择模式，允许你使用编辑的魔杖项目通常。//wand- Gives you the "edit wand" (by default, a wooden axe). Left click with this tool to select position 1 and right click to selection position 2./ /棒给你的“编辑棒”（默认情况下，一个木斧）。左键单击该工具的选择的位置1和右键选择位置2。Snapshots快照//restore [snapshot] -Restore a particular snapshot./ /恢复] [快照恢复特定的快照。//snap after <date> -Find the first snapshot after the given date./ /单元后，<日期> -给定的日期后找到第一个快照。//snap before <date> -Find the first snapshot before the given date./ /卡在<日期> -给定日期之前找到第一个快照。//snap list [num] -List the 5 newest snapshots.【数】/卡表表5最新的快照。//snap use <snapshot> -Use a particular snapshot./ /卡使用<快照> -使用一个特定的快照。超级镐// -Toggle the super pick axe./ /切换超级镐。//sp area <range> -Switch to area super pickaxe mode./ / SP区<范围>切换区超镐模式。//sp recur <range> -Switch to recursive super pickaxe mode./ / SP复发<范围>开关递归超级镐模式。//sp single -Switch to single block super pickaxe mode./ / SP单开关的单块超级镐模式。Tools工具//cycler -Block data cycler tool./ /循环块数据循环工具。//info- Switch to the info tool./ /信息交换的信息工具。//none -Switch to no tool./ /无开关没有工具。//repl <block> -Switch to the block replacer tool./ / REPL <块> -开关块替代工具。//tree [type] -Switch to the tree tool. Available types [tree, regular, big, bigtree, redwood, sequoia, tallredwood, tallsequoia, birch, white, whitebark, pine, randredwood, randomredwood, anyredwood, rand, random./ /树[型] -切换到树工具。可用的类型[树，规则，大，大树，红木，红杉，tallredwood，tallsequoia，桦木，白，白皮松，松树，randredwood，randomredwood，anyredwood，兰德，随机。Utilities公用事业//butcher [radius] -Kill nearby mobs./ /屠夫[半径]—杀死附近的怪物。//drain <radius>Drain nearby water/lava pools (within one block of lava/water)./ /漏<半径>漏极附近的水/熔岩池（在岩浆/水一块）。//ex [size]- Extinguish fires./ /前[大小]熄灭火灾。//fill <block> <radius> [depth] -Fill a hole./ /填写<块> <半径>【深度】填孔。//fillr <block> <radius>- Fill a hole fully recursively./ / fillr <块> <半径>填充孔完全递归。//fixlava <radius> -Level nearby pools of lava (within one block)./ / fixlava <半径>水平附近的池的熔岩（在一块）。//fixwater <radius> -Level nearby pools of water(within one block)./ / fixwater <半径>水平附近的水池（在一块）。//remove <type> <radius> -Remove nearby entities. Type can be "items" for loose items/drops, arrows, boats, minecarts, or tnt./ /删除<类型> <半径>删除附近的实体。类型可以是“物品”的松散的项目/滴，箭，船，minecarts，TNT。//removeabove [size] [height] -Remove blocks above your head./ / removeabove [大小] [高度]删除块在你头上。//removebelow [size] [height] -Remove blocks below your feet./ / removebelow [大小] [高度]删除块低于你的脚。//removenear [block] [size] -Remove blocks near you./ / removenear [块] [大小]删除块靠近你。//replacenear <size> <from-id> <to-id> -Replace all existing blocks nearby./ / replacenear＜量＞＜从ID > < ID > -取代现有的所有块附近。//snow [radius] -Simulate snow cover./ /雪[半径]—模拟积雪。//thaw [radius]- Unthaw/remove snow./ /融[半径]—unthaw /除雪。//toggleplace -Toggle between using pos #1 or your current position./ / toggleplace -切换使用POS # 1或您当前的位置之间。Troubleshooting故障排除If after installing this mod you get a black screen or stuck at done loading. There are four common problems for this, please double check all of these before posting a problem about a black screen:如果在安装这个mod，你会得到一个黑色的屏幕或停留在加载完。这有四个常见的问题，请仔细检查所有这些之前发布的关于一个黑屏问题：1. META-INF wasn't deleted.1。所不删除。2. You have a conflicting mod installed.2。你有一个矛盾的MOD安装。3. You are using the browser version of Minecraft, only the standalone version works.3。你正在使用的所有浏览器的版本，唯一的独立版本的作品。4. You installed the mod on the wrong version of Minecraft.4。你安装了国防部在Minecraft版本错误。Download下载Download SPC 4.9下载SPC 4.9Please note that I am not the creator of the Single Player Commands mod请注意，我不是单人创造者的命令模式
